response.original_title: Кто покупает волосы, и при чем тут секты?
response.overview: A new Kollektiv investigation — one that will make your hair stand on end.  Reporter Nastya Bakh follows a simple street ad, “We Buy Hair,” only to uncover a strange network linking hair trading, wig-making, and a religious cult.  From phone calls and field meetings to emotional encounters with those who wear the wigs, the story moves from curiosity to revelation — from roots to ends.
response.tagline: From street ads to secret cults — the hidden trade in human hair.
response.title: Who Buys Hair — and What Do Sects Have to Do With It?
